entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 11:29AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels At Hooper Bay through Monday... Elevated Water levels of 2 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line are possible through Sunday, with 1 to 2 feet Monday as winds switch to southwesterly and weaken. Residents should be aware of the possibility of minor flooding along the shore with ice piling up along the beach.
